alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 9:29AM CDT until April 16 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa... Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Union, Sioux and Lincoln Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... South Dakota...Minnesota... Rock River at Rock Rapids affecting Lyon County. Big Sioux River near Egan affecting Moody County. Big Sioux River near Richland affecting Plymouth and Union Counties. Big Sioux River at Brandon affecting Lyon, Lincoln and Minnehaha Counties. Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Hamlin and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. Big Sioux River near Canton affecting Lyon, Sioux and Lincoln Counties. Big Sioux River at Akron affecting Plymouth and Union Counties. Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Moody and Brookings Counties. Rock River near Hardwick affecting Rock County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rock River at Rock Rapids. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, the lower banks on the left side of the river will begin flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM CDT Thursday was 13.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain near a crest of 13.3 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Rock River Rock Rapids 13.0 13.3 Thu 8 am 13.3 13.0 12.5 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1115 AM CDT.
